sources.title: Code of the Cactus
sources.description: Lightning Bill Carson tries to stop cattle rustlers by posing as a Mexican. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Code of the Cactus (1939) TIM McCOY
sources.description:
Stars: Tim McCoy, Ben Corbett, Dorothy Short
Director: Sam Newfield

When Blackton outbids Bill Carson. Bill suspects he will have to rustle cattle to fulfill the contract. So Bill arrives posing as an Mexican. When he rustles the cattle from the rustlers, it gets him into the gang. Hoping to bring them all to justice, he is in trouble when his true identity is revealed.
